name: Read/Write Files from Disk
semantic_context: Read or write files from the computer that runs n8n
natural_language_description: 这是 Read/Write Files from Disk 节点。主要用于: Read or write files from the computer that runs n8n

info.displayName: Use this node to read and write files on the same computer running n8n. To handle files between different computers please use other nodes (e.g. FTP, HTTP Request, AWS).
info.name: info
info.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use this node to read and write files on the same computer running n8n. To handle files between different computers please use other nodes (e.g. FTP, HTTP Request, AWS).

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: read
available_options: Read File(s) From Disk (值: read) - Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n
Write File to Disk (值: write) - Create a binary file on the computer that runs n8n

fileSelector.name: fileSelector
fileSelector.description: Specify a file's path or path pattern to read multiple files. Always use forward-slashes for path separator even on Windows.
fileSelector.natural_language_description: 参数名: File(s) Selector | 作用: Specify a file's path or path pattern to read multiple files. Always use forward-slashes for path separator even on Windows. | 提示: Supports patterns, learn more here | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: append (值: None) - Whether to append to an existing file. While it's commonly used with text files, it's not limited to them, however, it wouldn't be applicable for file types that have a specific structure like most binary formats.

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Path and name of the file that should be written. Also include the file extension.
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Path and Name | 作用: Path and name of the file that should be written. Also include the file extension. | (必填项)

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

output_contract.standardizer_logic: if (operation === 'read') { return { payload: { primary: upstream.data } }; } else if (operation === 'write') { return { payload: { primary: { success: upstream.success, filePath: upstream.filePath } } }; }
